rationale: AAPL is expected to release positive earnings today, with analysts forecasting strong revenue growth. This could lead to a quick spike in the stock price, making short-term call options an attractive trade.

TSLA has broken out of a key resistance level with high trading volume, indicating strong bullish momentum. This breakout could lead to a continuation of the uptrend, making call options an enticing trade.
NFLX has been trading in a tight range with decreasing volatility, suggesting a potential breakout to the downside. A put option trade can capitalize on this expected move with high profit potential.
